name: Vocal Mural
imagePrompt: A grand, ethereal vocal mural manifesting from swirling light and sound, forming an immersive landscape of music and community, with 'gm fam' and 'this is amazing' appearing as holographic text.
flavorText: A slow, analog rebellion against speed, optimization, and noise. 'This is amazing! I'm so happy!'

spellEffect.description: Summon two 2/2 'New OrbWarriors'. They have Battlecry: 'gm fam!'
